channel.title: How Can I make an area a pvp zone? or a wild zone
channel.description: I want to make an area a pvp or wilderness zone. How can I do this? and how can I make it so people don't lose their items if they die?

item.title: How Can I make an area a pvp zone? or a wild zone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Try to change -

IsInClanGame

To -

isInClanGame

Also, check to see if you’ve added your method correctly.

item.title: How Can I make an area a pvp zone? or a wild zone
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Chrisofwow:

isinwilderness method, found it. How can I make it so people don’t lose their items?

Go to your client class.

Create a boolean for your PvP zone -

[code] public boolean inNAME() {
if (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) {
return true;

} else {
  return false;
}

}[/code]

Then, search for -

youDied()

You should see something like this -

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); } if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && inFunPk()) { toX = ####; toY = ####;

Change it to this -

if (!inNAME() && !IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) { client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; youdied(); killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); } if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && inNAME()) { toX = ####; toY = ####;

Then, replace the #### with the coordinates you want them to go to when they die from this zone.

Reply with any errors.

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I make an area a pvp zone? or a wild zone
